translations: v．使活跃，使充满生气（liven的过去式和过去分词）
· The party livened up when the music started playing.
音乐开始播放时，派对变得更加活跃。

sentences.sentence: He livened up the party by telling a joke.
sentences.translation: 他讲了一个笑话使聚会活跃起来。

sentences.sentence: All cities will become temporarily livened up!
sentences.translation: 全座城市都会暂时变得热闹起来！

sentences.sentence: The acrobatic troupe livened the garden party up immensely.
sentences.translation: 杂技团的表演使游园会大为活跃。
